title: Happy Birthday Grant
content:
What it sez in the thread title -- time zones are nifty. ;^)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141006194456im_/http:/typophile.com/files/BirthdayGrant_4905.gif)

Thanks to Dino dos Santos' Ventura, I can now pretend I'm a Portuguese writing master. Winning entry for [TDC2 2008](http://web.archive.org/web/20141006194456/http:/www.fontshop.be/details.php?entry=277).
author: Bald Condensed

comments.content: Happy birthday to a Typophile who has genuinely altered the course of the digital type industry — for the better.
Here come the spring babies! Happy birthday, Grant.
Happy Birthday! Have a great day!
Cheers, Grant! Que los cumplas feliz!

Happy Birthday, Grant.

_(And the obvious little German phrases thrown in: 'Alles Gute zum Geburtstag, Grant.' ;)_

Dav
Happy birthday Grant! Hope it's a good one.
Happy Birthday Grant! I'll be sure to send warm wishes your way, through every possible internets tube.
Sorry for belated message, but hope you had a very Happy Birthday, Grant!
